text: ai eemaanadaaron khuda kee itaat karo aur rasool kee aur jo tumamen se saahebaane hukoomat hon unakee itaat karo aur agar tum kisee baat mein jhagada karo pas agar tum khuda aur roze aakhirat par eemaan rakhate ho to is amr mein khuda aur rasool kee taraf roojoo karo yahee tumhaare haq mein behatar hai aur anjaam kee raah se bahut achchha hai
